description: This savoury pizza-inspired snack won't disappoint fussy eaters. It's got all their favourite flavours in one delicious bite.
keywords: Pizza,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Mushroom Pizza Bites Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Place mushrooms, bottom-side-up, on prepared pan. Bake for 10 minutes to release some of the moisture from the mushrooms.
Place small amount of pizza sauce into each mushroom hole. Top with cheese. Return to oven and bake for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Place olives and pineapple on melted cheese. Bake for a further 5 minutes or until cheese is golden. Serve.
